hanzi-su-wiki:
膜

Значения

Перепонка, мембрана

Мнемоника

Орган 月, который не видно 莫 — плёнка, плевра. Справа — солнце 日, поднявшееся из-за травы 艹, но пока не ставшее большим 大 в значении «не, нет».

membrane; film
мембрана; фильм
rtega_mnemonic:
膜膜RSmembrane, film, kneel and worship
  • the flesh 月 is hidden in darkness 莫 by the membrane
  • body of the Buddha 月 one suspects in the darkness 莫 of the temple for which one kneels in worship
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 莫 indicates the sound; ⺼ (flesh) conveys the meaning.

heisig_chinese_memo: In the moonlight of the graveyard I hear a zombie say, MMMMM..EMM...BRANEsssss (membrane).
heisig_constituent: membrane, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, graveyard, flowers, sun, day, large, St. Bernard
heisig_story: The part of the body first affected by a stroll through a haunted graveyard is the skin, which gets goose bumps. But we save the word "skin" for another kanji, and use the odd word "membrane" here. Think of being so scared through and through that the goose flesh moves from the outside in, giving you goose membranes.
koohiiStory1: In the moonlight of the graveyard I hear a zombie say, MMMMM..EMM...BRANEsssss.
koohiiStory2: The membranes in your flesh rot when placed in the graveyard.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you trap the moon in a greenhouse it will grow a creepy membrane around itself. The moon isn't used to the heat it would be exposed to in a greenhouse so that membrane is there to protect it. It's really gross looking though.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine seeing the moon with a membrane sitting stuffed in a greenhouse. It looks like something out of the Alien movies and you're starting to think putting it in there wasn't a good idea.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You decide to open the greenhouse to check this moon membrane out but when you open the door the smell of big macs (まく) hits you in the face. Eww. Why does this membrane smell like a big mac... or does that mean big macs smell like a festering moon?
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Can you imagine if the moon had a membrane and it smelled like a big mac? How does that even happen? You should probably go ask that food chain what they use for their ingredients.
Ru_Radicals: 大 (большой), 艾 (мокса), 日 (день), 月 (месяц)
Ru_trainchinese: mó: (сущ) мембрана; пленка, тонкая оболочка
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the body part (⺼) you 'must not' (莫) rupture is a membrane
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In the moonlight of the graveyard I hear a zombie say, MMMMM..EMM...BRANEsssss (membrane).
humanum_full_description_en:
From " meat " to " mo " sound. The original meaning is the thin skin tissue in the organism. "Shuowen": "Membrane, the meat is free. From the meat, it is silent." Such as "Huangdi Nei Jing. "Tai Yin Yang Ming Lun": "The spleen and the stomach are connected to the ear with a membrane, and the body fluid can be used for it." "Shen Nong's Materia Medica. Shangjing. "Cassia seed": "Cassia seed: taste Xianping. Mainly blue blindness, obscenity, red skin, white film, red eyes, pain, tears."

By extension, " membrane " refers to something that looks like a thin skin and looks like a membrane. Such as "Qi Min Yao Shu. "Raising Sheep": "When the milk is first fried, there is a film on it, grab it with your hand, and put it in the other utensil." Li Shangyin of the Tang Dynasty "Pomegranate": "The durian is beautiful, the durian is light and the durian is fresh."

"Worship" means to put your palms together to increase your head and bow down to the ground to show respect or awe. Such as "Luoyang Kalan Records. North of the city. "Song Yun Huisheng Makes the Western Regions": "When the king saw Song Yunyun the big Wei envoy came, he worshipped the edict." "Old Tang Book. Biography of Xi Rong. "Tianzhu Kingdom": "I was worshipped and received an edict, because he sent an envoy to pay tribute."
humanum_short_description_en: From " meat " to " mo " sound. The original meaning is the thin skin tissue in the organism.
humanum_full_description:
從「肉」，「莫」聲。本義是生物體內的薄皮組織。《說文》：「膜，肉閒胲膜也。从肉，莫聲。」如《黃帝內經．太陰陽明論》：「脾與胃以膜相連耳，而能為之行其津液。」《神農本草經．上經．決明子》：「決明子：味鹹平。主青盲，目淫，膚赤，白膜，眼赤痛，淚出。」

　　「膜」引申表示薄皮狀、像膜的東西。如《齊民要術．養羊》：「初煎乳時，上有皮膜，以手隨即掠取，著別器中。」唐代李商隱〈石榴〉：「榴枝婀娜榴實繁，榴膜輕明榴子鮮。」

　　「膜拜」意謂合掌加額，伏地而拜之禮，表示尊敬或畏服。如《洛陽伽藍記．城北．宋雲惠生使西域》：「國王見宋雲云大魏使來，膜拜受詔書。」《舊唐書．西戎列傳．天竺國》：「乃膜拜而受詔書，因遣使朝貢。」
humanum_short_description: 從「肉」，「莫」聲。本義是生物體內的薄皮組織。

膜(まく): membrane, film

從「 肉 」，「 莫 」聲。本義是生物體內的薄皮組織。《說文》：「膜，肉閒胲膜也。从肉，莫聲。」如《黃帝內經．太陰陽明論》：「脾與胃以膜相連耳，而能為之行其津液。」《神農本草經．上經．決明子》：「決明子：味鹹平。主青盲，目淫，膚赤，白膜，眼赤痛，淚出。」 「 膜 」引申表示薄皮狀、像膜的東西。如《齊民要術．養羊》：「初煎乳時，上有皮膜，以手隨即掠取，著別器中。」唐代李商隱〈石榴〉：「榴枝婀娜榴實繁，榴膜輕明榴子鮮。」 「膜拜」意謂合掌加額，伏地而拜之禮，表示尊敬或畏服。如《洛陽伽藍記．城北．宋雲惠生使西域》：「國王見宋雲云大魏使來，膜拜受詔書。」《舊唐書．西戎列傳．天竺國》：「乃膜拜而受詔書，因遣使朝貢。」
From " meat" to " mo" sound. The original meaning is the thin skin tissue in the organism. "Shuowen": "Membrane, the meat is free. From the meat, it is silent." Such as "Huangdi Nei Jing. "Tai Yin Yang Ming Lun": "The spleen and the stomach are connected to the ear with a membrane, and the body fluid can be used for it." "Shen Nong's Materia Medica. Shangjing. "Cassia seed": "Cassia seed: taste Xianping. Mainly blue blindness, obscenity, red skin, white film, red eyes, pain, tears." By extension, " membrane" refers to something that looks like a thin skin and looks like a membrane. Such as "Qi Min Yao Shu. "Raising Sheep": "When the milk is first fried, there is a film on it, grab it with your hand, and put it in the other utensil." Li Shangyin of the Tang Dynasty "Pomegranate": "The durian is beautiful, the durian is light and the durian is fresh." "Worship" means to put your palms together to increase your head and bow down to the ground to show respect or awe. Such as "Luoyang Kalan Records. North of the city. "Song Yun Huisheng Makes the Western Regions": "When the king saw Song Yunyun the big Wei envoy came, he worshipped the edict." "Old Tang Book. Biography of Xi Rong. "Tianzhu Kingdom": "I was worshipped and received an edict, because he sent an envoy to pay tribute."

膜字的基本解释

膜
mó
动植物体内像薄皮的组织：肋膜。耳膜。黏膜。苇膜。
〔膜拜〕跪在地上高举双手虔诚地行礼。
像膜的薄皮：牛奶表面结了一层薄膜。

膜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mó］
［《廣韻》慕各切，入鐸，明。］
(1)人或动植物体内的薄皮形组织，具有保护作用。
(2)指像膜一样的东西。
(3)比喻细微的间隔。
(4)沙漠。
[②]［mó］
［《廣韻》莫胡切，平模，明。］
见“膜2拜”。

膜字的英文翻译

◎ 膜
film, theca, membrane, velamen, velum

膜字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　膜； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页993第01
【唐韻】慕各切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】末各切，?音莫。【說文】肉閒脉膜也。【廣韻】肉膜。【釋名】膜，幕也，幕絡一體也。【爾雅·釋器·肉曰脫之疏】治肉除其筋膜，取好者。【博雅】䐞膜也。　又撫也。【揚子·方言】膜，撫也。【註】謂撫順也。　又【廣韻】【正韻】莫胡切【集韻】【韻會】蒙晡切，?音糢。【廣韻】膜，拜也。【穆天子傳】膜拜而受。【註】長跪拜也。

膜字的源字形

膜字的起名意思

动、植物体内像薄皮的组织。也指像膜那样的薄皮。

membrane
Basic explanation of words
membrane
mó
Thin skin tissues in animals and plants: pleura. Eardrum. Mucosa. Reed membrane.
[Worship] Kneeling on the ground raising both hands to salute religiously.
Thin skin like film: a thin film formed on the surface of milk.
membrane
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mó］
["Guangyun" Mu Geqie, enter the priest, Ming. ]
(1) The thin skin-shaped tissues in humans, animals and plants have a protective effect.
(2) Refers to something like a membrane.
(3) It is a metaphor for subtle intervals.
(4) Desert.
[②]［mó］
["Guangyun" Mo Huqie, flat model, Ming. ]
See "Film 2 Worship".

membrane
Source glyph
membrane
Name meaning
Animals and plants are like thin-skinned tissues. Also refers to thin skin like a membrane.
形声字。肉(月)表意,其形像块肉,表示膜处在肌肉之间;莫(mo)表声,莫通幕,幕有分隔的作用,膜对肌肉也有分
隔的作用。本义是生物体内的薄膜。
①人或动植物体内像薄皮一样的组织:耳~「肋~|
竹~。②像膜一样的东西:橡皮~|塑料薄~。
~拜 瓣~ 薄~ 笛~ 腹~ 膈~ 隔~ 骨~
肌~ 角~ 结~ 脑~ 黏~ 胸~ 顶礼~拜
膜
mó
膜
膜
Пиктофонетические символы.
Мясо (луна) означает, что его форма похожа на кусок мяса, что означает, что мембрана находится между мышцами; mo (mo) выражает звук, а занавес выполняет функцию разделения, а мембрана также имеет разделительную функцию. воздействие на мышцы.
Первоначальный смысл - пленка в организме.
①Тонкие, похожие на кожу ткани у людей, животных и растений: уши ~, ребра ~ | бамбук ~. ②Вещи, подобные мембранам: резина ~ | тонкий пластик ~.
~ Лоскут поклонения ~ Тонкий ~ Флейта ~ Живот ~ Диафрагма ~ Перегородка ~ Кость ~
Мышцы ~ рога ~ узлы ~ мозги ~ липкие ~ грудь ~ луки ~ поклонение
мембрана
мембрана
мембрана
mó
I сущ.
1) плёнка, оболочка; кожица
治肉, 除其筋膜 при разделке мяса удаляют плёнки
2) анат. мембрана, перепонка
胸膜 плевра
3) физ. брана (в теории струн)
II гл.
поклоняться
Radicals: 月, 莫  (moon, greenhouse)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you trap the moon in a greenhouse it will grow a creepy membrane around itself. The moon isn't used to the heat it would be exposed to in a greenhouse so that membrane is there to protect it. It's really gross looking though.
Imagine seeing the moon with a membrane sitting stuffed in a greenhouse. It looks like something out of the Alien movies and you're starting to think putting it in there wasn't a good idea.
Reading Mnemonic
You decide to open the greenhouse to check this moon membrane out but when you open the door the smell of big macs (まく) hits you in the face. Eww. Why does this membrane smell like a big mac... or does that mean big macs smell like a festering moon?
Can you imagine if the moon had a membrane and it smelled like a big mac? How does that even happen? You should probably go ask that food chain what they use for their ingredients.
